patterns: i want to cancel my order
how can i cancel my order?
responses: We do offer a cancel policy for orders placed under 2 days, for canceling your order please refer to our cancel order segment under your orders bar
The subscription costs 199 rupees per year

patterns: what are the benefits your membership
elaborate on adavantages of your subscription
responses: Membership benefits include: no delivery charges,fast delivery compared to others, some additional discounts on selected products from time to time and early notifications on seasonal sales.

patterns: do you have a return policy?
how can i return the products?
responses: We provide 7 day return policy and 2 day exchange service (unused ofcourse) depending upon the product, unfortunately there is no return policy on eatables
for return and exchanging the product: please visit our return policy section under your current order sections
